page.title: 12WEST DERBY VILLAGE,LIVERPOOL
page.content: WEST DERBY IS A VILLAGE IN LIVERPOOL.IT IS QUITE SMALL YET OUR VILLAGE HAS ALL ITS OWN FACILITIES.WE HAVE A LOVELY BIG CHURCH CALLED ST.MARY'S AND A COUNTRY PARK WHICH USED TO BE OWNED BY THE EARL OF SEFTON.WE HAVE A PRIMARY SCHOOL RIGHT IN THE HEART OF THE VILLAGE.WE HAVE OUR OWN SPORTS FIELD AND SHOPS.IN THE VILLAGE WE HAVE A GARAGE AND A BIG SUPERMARKET.IT HAS ITS OWN VIDEO SHOP,ESTATE AGENTS AND POST OFFICE AT WHICH MY MUM WORKS.WE KEEP THE VILLAGE CLEAN AND TIDY WITH ROAD SWEEPERS. THERE IS A MONUMENT IN THE VILLAGE TO COMMEMORATE THE PULLING DOWN OF OUR OLD CHAPEL. {...HOUSING SURVEY.... {TYPES OF RESIDENCES:TERRACED-719 { SEMI-DET-673 { DETACHED- 31 { FLATS- 52
